data.Sentence_cn: 青春期
data.Sentence: --- Lesson 34 Adolescence

data.Sentence_cn: 青少年尊重父母什么？
data.Sentence: What do adolescents respect in parents?

data.Sentence_cn: 当家长听到孩子赞扬自己朋友的家时，总感到不安，认为孩子在嫌弃自家的饭菜、卫生、或家具，
data.Sentence: Parents are often upset when their children praise the homes of their friends and regard it as a slur on their own cooking, or cleaning, or furniture,

data.Sentence_cn: 而且愚蠢地让孩子看出自己的烦恼。
data.Sentence: and often are foolish enough to let the adolescents see that they are annoyed.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们甚至责备孩子不忠，或者讲些小朋友家长的坏话。
data.Sentence: They may even accuse them of disloyalty, or make some spiteful remark about the friends' parents.

data.Sentence_cn: 家长这种有失身份和孩子气的作法使青春期的孩子大为震惊，
data.Sentence: Such a loss of dignity and descent into childish behaviour on the part of the adults deeply shocks the adolescents,

data.Sentence_cn: 决心以后不再向父母讲述去过的地方和见过的人。
data.Sentence: and makes them resolve that in future they will not talk to their parents about the places or people they visit.

data.Sentence_cn: 不要很久,家长就会抱怨孩子守口如瓶，什么事也不告诉他们，
data.Sentence: Before very long the parents will be complaining that the child is so secretive and never tells them anything,

data.Sentence_cn: 殊不知这是他们自找的。
data.Sentence: but they seldom realize that they have brought this on themselves.

data.Sentence_cn: 孩子们对家长幻想的破灭，
data.Sentence: Disillusionment with the parents,

data.Sentence_cn: 在某种程度上是不可避免的，不管家长的人品有多么好，作为父母有多么合格。
data.Sentence: however good and adequate they may be both as parents and as individuals, is to some degree inevitable.

data.Sentence_cn: 除非父母自身不能令人满意，
data.Sentence: Most children have such a high ideal of their parents,

data.Sentence_cn: 大多数孩子对父母估价过高，以致这种估价很难指望经受住现实的考验。
data.Sentence: unless the parents themselves have been unsatisfactory, that it can hardly hope to stand up to a realistic evaluation.

data.Sentence_cn: 家长会大为吃惊和深受感动，当他们意识到孩子们的这种信念
data.Sentence: Parents would be greatly surprised and deeply touched if they realized how much belief their children usually have in their character and infallibility,

data.Sentence_cn: 会对孩子产生多么大的影响。
data.Sentence: and how much this faith means to a child.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果家长对青少年的这种反应有思想准备，
data.Sentence: If parents were prepared for this adolescent reaction,

data.Sentence_cn: 并且意识到这象征着孩子们正在成熟
data.Sentence: and realized that was a sign that the child was growing up

data.Sentence_cn: 和正在发展宝贵的观察力、独立判断力，
data.Sentence: and developing valuable powers of observation and independent judgment,

data.Sentence_cn: 那么他们就不会那样伤心，也就不会由于怨恨和抵触这种反应，而把孩子推到自己的对立面去。
data.Sentence: they would not be so hurt, and therefore would not drive the child into opposition by resenting and resisting it.

data.Sentence_cn: 青少年酷爱真诚，
data.Sentence: The adolescent, with his passion for sincerity,

data.Sentence_cn: 他们总是尊敬能够承认错误或无知的父母，
data.Sentence: always respects a parent who admits that he is wrong, or ignorant,

data.Sentence_cn: 尽管自己遭到了不公平或不公正的待遇。
data.Sentence: or even that he has been unfair or unjust.

data.Sentence_cn: 孩子们所不能原谅的是：父母错了，孩子们也看出来了，可是做父母的还不肯承认。
data.Sentence: What the child cannot forgive is the parents' refusal to admit these charges if the child knows them to be true.

data.Sentence_cn: 维多利亚时代的父母认为，他们可靠无理的权威气派来维护自己的尊严，实际上那是根本不行的。
data.Sentence: Victorian parents believed that they kept their dignity by retreating behind an unreasoning authoritarian attitude in fact they did nothing of the kind,

data.Sentence_cn: 孩子们只不过被吓得不敢让父母知道自己的想法罢了。
data.Sentence: but children were then too cowed to let them know how they really felt.

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然现在我们倾向于走向另一个极端，
data.Sentence: Today we tend to go to the other extreme,

data.Sentence_cn: 但总地来看，孩子和家长双方态度都比较端正。
data.Sentence: but on the whole this is a healthier attitude both for the child and the parent.

data.Sentence_cn: 遇事采取面对现实的态度总是比较明智和稳妥的，尽管会有暂时的痛苦。
data.Sentence: It is always wiser and safer to face up to reality, however painful it may be at the moment.
